alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Harrison; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 12 at 9:31PM CDT until March 12 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR HARRISON...EAST CENTRAL HANCOCK AND NORTHWESTERN JACKSON COUNTIES... At 931 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lyman, or 8 miles northwest of Gulfport, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Ocean Springs, Long Beach, St. Martin, Diamondhead, D`iberville, Latimer, Lyman, Gulf Hills, Vancleave, Hickory Hills, Saucier and Gulfport Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 16 and 59. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 2 and 4. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
